Name: Mob Stadium
About the game: Mob Stadium holds the secret to escaping the end of all time! Traps, challenges, and a Grand Finale await your demise in this challenging shooter made for the HTC Vive. As the brown dwarf Wormwood returns, the Anunnaki have emerged from the aether to test humankind. Armed with a small pistol and trapped in a terrestrial Anunnaki compound, can you survive long enough to decipher the mysteries of Mob Stadium? Features: Smooth track-pad based locomotion* Fast action gun-play Puzzle solving Maze-like map progression *Smooth movement can cause VR motion sickness *HTC Vive and SteamVR required
